title: Dischord is Now in Session
description: Andrea and Scott bring their dispute before the Judge: must singalongs be conducted with careful attention to pitch and key? Expert witnesses Jonathan Coulton and David Rees weigh in.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
